page.title: 18IN THE NEWS.
page.content: {Bradford Fire.}In May a fire broke out at Bradford City football ground during the match between Bradford and Lincoln City.54 people were killed. The stand was made of wood. {Teachers Dispute.}Teachers Unions are angry about their pay award. The government offered a 4% rise in January. Teachers in the N.U.T. and NAS/UWT have been taking action by not covering at dinner times, and some have struck in support of their pay claim.The government say they haven't any more money to give.{ {Belgian Football Riot.}Last week Liverpool and Juventus played the European Cup Final in Brussels.There were 42 people killed and a lot injured.English teams are banned in European competitions because Liverpool fans started the riot. { Alison Fletcher and Nicola Cockroft.
